name: MemoryMayhem
description:
In Memory Madness, you play as a tiny robot who is frantically working inside your computer’s processor to clear up your cache. As more and more data is dumped into the cache, you must work quickly to process the data and reduce memory leaks. Compute the target numbers to score point and clear up space.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/memory-mayhem
